Beachcomber looked up and smiled. "They belong to a Badger. Part of the
Mustelidae family, a carnivorous mammal." Beachcomber explained. He
extended one finger pointing to the paw marks. "Note the deep gashes in
the ground." he began. "Badgers have long claws used for burrowing, they
live underground for protection."

Firedrill was absolutely ingrossed in this. He looked up at Beachcomber
with childlike bewilderment. He made sure to remember that, he was sure
going to enjoy this planet. He ran his finger gently through the tack,
to feel them.
